turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please pick me up a grande cherry mocha, at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Put it on my account at Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Is there anything else you'd like me to pick up for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the cherry mocha grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which store would you like me to go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go to the Starbucks on the Post Road in Milford, near the mall. That is closest.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I am heading toward the Starbucks on the Post Road, should be there soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm at Starbucks ordering. One Grande Cherry Mocha to go, on your account.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Very good. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like a receipt for that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A receipt will be sent to your phone as a text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Very good. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have your Grande Cherry Mocha and heading back now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See you soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.
